cab.content: Circulated by the Secretary of State for India. From Viceroy, Foreign Department, 2Zrd July 1917. (Received at India Office, 10 p.m.) Foreign Secret. Weekly report. North-West Frontier Province quiet.Mohmand settlement reported separately. Mahsuds still collecting rifles tobe surrendered, and date for final settlement has been postponed for fewdays. There is no change in the general military situation in India orAfghanistan.ilTWIWBJBlTlliniiiiwm^^ ...... iSECRET
